title: REA Lot #517: 1910 T209 Contentnea First Series Proof-Card Collection (4)

posts.post_title: REA Lot #517: 1910 T209 Contentnea First Series Proof-Card Collection (4)
posts.post_content:
I missed out on this lot, but I would really like to buy one of the examples if the seller is a member of Net54.

[url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=175127[/url]

Turner, I hope you're doing well.  I acquired this grouping from REA, but I don't have them in hand yet.  If anyone else is interested, feel free to drop me a pm as I may split the grouping...haven't really decided.
